title: My lady nicotine
creator_credit: Rustom Master, V.R. Sarma, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: India is the world’s third largest producer of tobacco. This film shows various aspects of this industry from the cultivation through to the manufacture of cigarettes, cigars, pipe-tobacco, beedis and snuff.
creator_credit_for_label: Rustom Master, V.R. Sarma, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
